refnamediv.refpurpose: Patch a file with a binary diff.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: xdiff_file_patch_binary patches file file with binary patch in file patch and stores result in file dest.

note.para: Both files (file and patch) will be loaded into memory so ensure that your memory_limit is set high enough.

example.title: xdiff_file_patch_binary example
example.para: The following code applies binary diff to a file.
example.programlisting:
<?php
$old_version = 'archive-1.0.tgz';
$patch = 'archive.bpatch';

$result = xdiff_file_patch_binary($old_version, $patch, 'archive-1.1.tgz');
if ($result) {
   echo "File patched";
} else {
   echo "File couldn't be patched";
}

?>
